page.title: 05COMMUNITY NEEDS
page.content:
Our community has many hopes and aspirations for the future.
Full employment is obviously a top priority.
A local survey showed that these were some of the desires of the people:
"A sports complex to include a track. Many promising athletes and sportsmen are lost because there are no facilities for them after they reach school leaving age."
"A park to include a collection of zoological specimens would bring visitors and trade."
"More adequate parking facilities are needed with the increasing congestion of vehicles."
